Author: uhhh206
Text: I hate how frequently people comment on my body... but I also low-key love it sometimes.  I can't handle someone calling me "healthy" or other generic compliments that are insults to people with EDs, but if they say I'm too thin then it feels like I'm doing something right. And yet, it also feels motivating like "this isn't even my final form".  I'm not satisfied until people are worried by how thin I am.  Bah.

Author: rachihc
Text: I feel you but on the same page if I don't get any comments then I will think " Oh great I am still fat" or "I have not lost enough". ED brain will use anything against us, twist it what ever way to make us fell like shit. But by default people should not comment on others body.
